author: FourFourTwo
description: Edinson Cavani, Kylian Mbappe and Leonardo Jardim were the big winners at this season's Ligue 1 awards.
title: Cavani and Mbappe win big at Ligue 1 awards

author: BBC Sport
description: French club AS Monaco celebrate winning Ligue 1 for the first time in 17 years by gatecrashing the post-match press conference.
title: Monaco: Ligue 1 winners gatecrash news conference

author: FourFourTwo
description: Monaco's eighth Ligue 1 title was all the more special as it was against the odds, according to the club's coach Leonardo Jardim.
title: Jardim delight at Monaco's Ligue 1 title win against the odds

author: FourFourTwo
description: Monaco's 17-year wait for the Ligue 1 title is at an end after their 2-0 win against Saint-Etienne.
title: Monaco end PSG dominance to win Ligue 1 title

author: FourFourTwo
description: Emmanuel Bourgaud struck deep in added time to win promotion for Amiens, with Strasbourg also earning a place in Ligue 1.
title: Strasbourg and Amiens win promotion to Ligue 1 in dramatic finale

author: FourFourTwo
description: Kylian Mbappe and Valere Germain goals secured the Ligue 1 title for Monaco, leading Prince Albert II to hail their extraordinary triumph.
title: Prince Albert II hails 'extraordinary' Monaco Ligue 1 title triumph

author: FourFourTwo
description: Kylian Mbappe's 15th league goal of the season helped Monaco beat Saint-Etienne 2-0 on Wednesday, claiming the Ligue 1 title for his side.
title: Monaco 2 Saint-Etienne 0: Mbappe and Germain fire Jardim's men to Ligue 1 title

author: FourFourTwo
description: Why has it been such a successful season for Ligue 1 champions Monaco? We examine key five reasons behind their remarkable achievements.
title: Falcao's form, PSG's woe and Mbappe's meteoric rise: Key reasons behind Monaco's Ligue 1 triumph

author: FourFourTwo
description: Monaco boss Leonardo Jardim is refusing to celebrate despite the club having all but ended PSG's reign as Ligue 1 champions.
title: Jardim warns Monaco are not there yet

author: FourFourTwo
description: Monaco players made sure Leonardo Jardim played a full part in their Ligue 1 title celebrations.
title: WATCH: Celebrating Monaco stars invade Jardim's news conference
